pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simulation with Kernel Density Estimation // Generates random values from a univariate and multivariate continuous distribution by using kernel density estimation based on a sample. Duong (2017) doi:10.18637/jss.v021.i07, Christian P. Robert and George Casella (2010 ISBN:978-1-4419-1575-7) doi:10.1007/978-1-4419-1576-4.
